resources.string: D. Permission required for call management
For keyboard test in TEXT_INPUT_MODE click here
For keyboard test in VIEW_MODE click here
It is necessary to enable for correct operation of Text Layout Tools

ON: ALT-mode characters/numbers will be typed until the space bar is pressed;
 OFF: ALT characters/numbers will be disabled immediately after entering the first character (Blackberry keyboard like behaviour).
 2xALT: Alt symbols entering till alt-mode is disabled.
 For more useful features for working with symbols, see the Manual.
If the setting is disabled, a Capital letter will be entered by holding the button;\n For more utilities for working with Capital letters, see the Manual in chapter B
Answer call: Key1|2 2хSpace; Pocket|Slim: 1xShift;\nDecline/End call: Key1|2 2хSYM Pocket|Slim: 1xAlt.

The panel (showing at input) with arrows and swipes to move cursor and the input layout (with flag)\n Opening the on-screen SYM-pad, NAV-pad keyboard will work anyway.\n You can open/close the swipe-panel with any setting by Shift+Ctrl.
9. Keyboard gestures mode in the viewing mode
10. Layout icon on the right (without notification)
12. BACK/HOME key must be pressed 2 times, if the text is entered

This is necessary to protect yourself from accidentally clicking on BACK and HOME key and losing the entered text. The setting only works if some text is entered in the input field. If there is no text and the field is empty, then BACK and HOME key work as usual.\n\tThis is really necessary if you enter a lot of text in BROWSER applications, where accidentally pressing BACK will throw you to the previous page and reset the input form
13. Show a frame around the selected element in Pointer mode in view mode
\tWhen the "native" backlight of the selected interface element is poorly visible.\n\tIn addition, without this, sometimes it is not at all clear where the focus is right now.
13A. Color of the frame choosing from settings item 13
\tIn order for the color settings to be applied, it is necessary to switch off/onn the special service K12KB

\tYou can disable it when you use the NAV mode via the hard keyboard and remember everything.\n\tIn addition, if another function is hanging on the same button (for example, changing the language), so that the NAV-pad that comes out does not infuriate every time.

First initialization after installation in strict sequence: A, B, C, D, E.
 K12KB does not collect your data and does not have access to internet.
 In the Settings item A, disable unnecessary layouts (because the keyboard comes out of the box for several devices). The rest of the Settings (default values) are made so that it is convenient to use as is.
 
 Do not forget to enable Visual Keyboard option in Android Hardware keyboard settings. This option is needed to show NAV, SYM and SWIPE on-screen keyboards.
 If your device has keyboard-touch sensor, you need to enable it in your Android Hardware keyboard settings.

K12KB does not collect your data and does not have access to internet.\n Do not forget to enable Visual Keyboard option in Android Hardware keyboard settings. This option is needed to show NAV, SYM and SWIPE on-screen keyboards.\n If your device has keyboard-touch sensor, you need to enable it in your Android Hardware keyboard settings.
Moving the cursor over the text in left and right direction
Moving the cursor over the text (+up-down)

K12KB does not collect your data and does not have access to internet.
 It helps K12KB to understand in which field the cursor is located for calling search windows (for searching when entering and typing in BB Contacts, Dialer, Telegram, etc.).
 In addition, it is _mandatory_ to enable it to work SpeedKey as CTRL on non Russian market Blackberry Key2 phones.
 In addition, highlighting in the pointer mode and clicking on the highlighted by space key.
Identifiers of the Search field resource so that it activate focus into it when you start typing

Log in to the app to automatically find the search field.\nIf you have entered, but nothing has changed here, then the auto-search in the application does not work and the algorithm for determining the search field does not find anything, or the search field identifier is determined only dynamically and everything works.
In this application, the search field cannot be remembered, it is always determined dynamically:

When you enter the application, you can not click on "Search", but immediately start typing. The plugin will activate focus on search field itself when you start typing.
It has happened (rarely) that the plugin is trained incorrectly, then you need to click the "Clear" button at the bottom and retrain the plugin again.
\nFor search plugins to work, you need to activate special features in the main menu.
Gesture modes (on input fields, disabled on viewing mode)
No editor found for JS files
Hide bar by default (Ctrl+W to show)
Delete cached dictionaries? They will be rebuilt on next load.
Keyboard learns words you type and uses them in suggestions

Ctrl+T to toggle translation mode.
Translates current word in suggestion bar.
Uses previous word context for phrase translation.
Source: current layout, target: next layout.
